Title: Tehran
Writer: Ian Martin (teleplay by), Tony Roche (teleplay by), Armando Iannucci (story), Ian Martin (story), Tony Roche (story), Armando Iannucci (created by)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: President Meyer travels to Iran, where an American reporter is being detained.
